Definition: Given reviews from Amazon, you need to classify them into two classes: Negative or Positive.

Positive Examples.input: I've read this book with much expectation, it was very boring all through out the book
Positive Examples.explanation: Review writer does not like the book because it was boring, therefore it is a negative review.

Positive Examples.input: I believe I will be very happy with the camcorder. Its small,light and easy to handle.The LCD is clear and bright.Ease of operation.
Positive Examples.explanation: There are positive words in the review like "very happy", "easy to handle", therefore it is a positive review.

Positive Examples.input: love it...very touch.it's to bad that in the dvd description doesn't mention no subtitles
Positive Examples.explanation: There are positive words in the review like "love it", "very touch", therefore it is classified as positive review. Pay attention that although the reviewer is not happy that it's not mentioned that there are no subtitles, the overall polarity of the review is positive.

Negative Examples.input: It starts off a bit slow, but once the product placement jokes start it takes off.
Negative Examples.explanation: This review is positive review since it says that after product placement joke it becomes interesting.

Negative Examples.input: As good as this book may be, the print quality is so bad that I cannot read it. Zero stars would have been more appropriate.
Negative Examples.explanation: This is a negative review. because the print quality of book is very bad and not readable.

Negative Examples.input: I love it, it's LONG and the connection is secure and it doesn't get hot! It's wonderful!
Negative Examples.explanation: This is a positive review because it says "I love it" and "It's wonderful".

Instances.input: For anybody who's looking for the 1978 movie with Lauren Bacall - this is not it ! Actually it's a 12 minute CBS music video by a group called "Perfect Gentleman" with 2 titles on it: "Ooh la la" and "One more Chance". This is not a rating of this video (I didn't bother watching it) but just of the fact that there's absolutely no information in the Amazon product details which could have told me this wasn't the feature film I was looking for before I ordered it. That's even more a pity as it was the fastest delivery I ever got from the US to Europe by Mail - a very short-lived joy.

This is a book that is used in colleges across America, but contains almost no primary source quotes, no footnotes, no endnotes, and thus no scholarly support for any of it's assertions. Did the author even bother to read the founders' letters, speeches, published works, etc? Probably not, bc actual quotes from those who founded this country would really get in the way of their made up speculation, hearsay, and biased opinions masquerading as historical fact. Pathetic.

I have had several of these monitors. I use a two-monitor set-up.-The backlight on the first burned out one month out of warrantee. ViewSonic would not replace the first monitor- fair enough as it was out of warrantee. I purchased a replacement. When it came, the screen was blue, and the color could not be adjusted. ViewSonic sent a replacement which had a green screen, and again, the color could not be adjusted. They were unable to find another VA912b, so they sent a different model to replace it.-Meanwhile, my second monitor, again a VA912b burned out the backlight after less than six months of use.-Beware that the glowing reviews you see for this monitor may not take into account its poor reliability. Should you choose this monitor, be sure to get an extended warrantee! Better yet, do yourself a favor and choose another model or manufacturer.

This is a solid replacement for Apple's charger. It is light weight and does the job it was intended to do. Blue "on" light simply tells you it's plugged in, but there's no indicator to tell you when the computer is fully charged. Lacks the portability elegance of the Apple charger, but costs a lot less.
